description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync EA294WMi - 29" - LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
The NEC MultSync EA294WMi features an extremely thin 29" 21:9 IPS LED backlight panel with a resolution of 2560 x 1080 which results in an ultra-modern and slim design. Due to the format which complies to a dual screen set up of two 19" conventional screens it is an excellent alternative for any multiple screen set up. Ambient light and human sensors enforce the sustainable product concept while offering improved ergonomics.
